programme.title: BACK TO NORMAL
programme.desc: For Ian Mitchard jumping out of airplanes and soaring above the earth with a nylon canopy is as normal as walking through the grocery store. But when a dramatic accident put the lifestyle he loves in jeopardy, Ian is forced to grapple with his body.

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2023 Autumn: Full Highlights

programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2024 Summer: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: Cerro Torre Fly & Climb
programme.desc: The West Face route with its long glacier approach through the Circo de los Altares certainly feels ‘out there’. That the whole team were able to take off from the summit with their paragliders is a testament to their skill, both as climbers and as pilots.

programme.title: One Water Race 2024
programme.desc: The concept is straight forward; starting at Arholma in the north, the first to reach Landsort in the south is crowned the winner. Running and swimming the only method of movement. No track and free choice of route but with some unknown check points needed to pass along the way.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - stop #1 - Baqueira Beret (ESP)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Freeride World Tour 2023 "Live Summary"

programme.title: adidas Rockstars 2019 - Stuttgart (GER)
programme.desc: The popular competition for the international climbing elite is taking place for the ninth time. Around 4,000 spectators can cheer as world and European champions, World Cup winners and Olympic champions show why bouldering is one of the most difficult disciplines of all.

programme.title: Expedition Antarctica - Caro North - Antarctic
programme.desc: Ice climbing, ski mountaineering and days of sailing on open waters through the infamous Drake Passage: 28-year-old extreme athlete Caro North set off for a four-week expedition to the far south of our continent.

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 2 - USA
programme.desc: The Swiss mountaineering company Mammut is celebrating its 150th anniversary with the largest summit project in history: 150 summit ascents are being organized worldwide as part of the “150 Peaks Project”.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2020 - #1 Japan
programme.desc: The season kick-off of the world’s most important freeride series for skiers and snowboarders will be held at Hakuba (JPN).

programme.title: Cape Epic 2024 - Prologue
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers from around the world through 617 Untamed kilometres of unspoilt scenery and up 16 500m of climbing.

programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers from around the world through 617 Untamed kilometres of unspoilt scenery and up 16 500m of climbing.

programme.title: FIA Karting Grand Prix - World Championship
programme.desc: Karting is the best for future car champions and is also practiced by enthusiasts who dedicate all their energy to it. The FIA Karting Championships are open to drivers aged 12 and over and there is no upper age limit.

programme.title: The history of competitive Snowboarding
programme.desc: This Competition is in human nature. But that was far from the thoughts of early pioneers in the nineteen hundreds or those of Mister Sherman Poppin of Michigan. In the Christmas of 1965 he invented the Snurfer. This changed the history of snowsports.

programme.title: X-Project 2.0

programme.desc: This is a behind-the-scenes look at one of Europe's most prestigious ski and snowboard events - the Audi Nines. On the avant-garde course with new features, the laws of gravity seem to be constantly being rewritten.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E14 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 14, Gibraltar
programme.desc: This is it the last show before the world final. These guys have really got to fight for the points now, this is going to be action packed, whilst these guys fight it out all day.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E15 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 15, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Alanya, on Turkey’s south-coast for the final stop at the end of a mammoth season of Strongman Champions League. Here in the sunshine, we’ll finally crown our world champion and what a place Alanya is. You could not ask for a better setting. After months of hard-work, if not years for some of these lads, we find out who will take the world title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E16 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 16, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: Welcome, to day two of the strongman champions league 2022 finals here in Alanya, Turkey. It’s all up for grabs now, everyone is fighting for the world title belt. This is an epic episode where we finally crown the World champion of 2022.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E01 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 1 - Finland
programme.desc: Welcome to the 2023 Strongman Champions League in Vaasa, Finland! This year’s event introduces a knockout format with 6 intense events over 90 minutes, ending in a unique deadlift face-off with boats.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E02 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 2 - Serbia
programme.desc: Stage 2 of the Strongman Champions League 2023 is set in Zrenjanin, Serbia. This exciting event features 5 challenging contests, including a superhuman Yoke race. As the SCL World Series Tour continues, athletes will battle it out to claim the yellow leader’s position for the season. Don’t miss this incredible stage of strength and endurance!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E03 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 3 - Finland Teams World
programme.desc: The World’s Strongest Team will be crowned in this edition of SCL, here in Kalajoki-Finland we’ve picked some of the best in the business, teamed them up, and they’ll be going all out against each other. It’s now no longer about being a lonely wolf, but more about the pack mentality. It is a competition over 7 events, including a Big 2-man Log lift and heavy deadlift. Let’s start the action.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E04 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 4 - Holland
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League in Holland at the Dru Factory in ULFT. A great location for a spectacular battle with 14 Athletes over 3 events! The first 3 events in this episode are Truckpull/ Superyoke and Farmerswalk, with 2 massive logs of 150 kg in their hands. So, join us for the show of strength, the place of power, it’s the circus of the extreme.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E05 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 5 - Holland 2023
programme.desc: Ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, strongman fans across the world, we are back for SCL Holland part two. Get ready because it’s about to get heavy. The Strongman Champions League in Holland, continues with the last 3 events, here at the Dru Factory in ULFT. The events in this episode are the Viking Press, Wheel Flip and the Atlas Stones, with 180 kg in the end.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E06 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 6 - World's Strongest Latino
programme.desc: For the first time ever, the World’s Strongest Latino competition has begun. This two-day event in Porto, Portugal, features 20 athletes from around the world competing in 8 events. After 4 grueling events, the top 12 will advance to the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E07 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 7 - Finland World Record Breakers
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League World Record Breakers 2023 starts with a 25-ton snow plow! Crazy machines are pulled and pushed, with many kilograms moved. A few new world records are set in this competition.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E08 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 8 - Portugal
programme.desc: We have returned to the powerhouse of Portugal for an edge-of-your-seat galactic battle. If all the planets collided at once, it wouldn’t compare to the bang of this show. Get ready for the battle of the beasts; it’s the heaviest show in the universe, the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E09 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 9 - England
programme.desc: SCL UK has landed in Gloucester it is workout war fitness for the ferocious, it’s going to be a a battle of the brutal, a rampage of the roofless. This is going to be a massacre of the muscles. You know it by now, but just in case you don’t, this is strongman champions league.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E10 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 10 - World's Strongest Viking
programme.desc: On the menu this week it’s medieval madness, we’ve come back to the middle ages to test our noble men through a muscle gaining of events. They are hoping and we are hoping that one will survive to take the title of the world’s strongest Viking. The official World's Strongest Viking is this time in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: This week is a good one, can you feel the energy? Sit still, just look at me and try and feel the energy, because I can tell you, the atmosphere here is electric, it’s explosive, there is a pure elemental force going through these athletes' veins. I’m shaking because it’s Poland, it’s powerful, it’s strongman champions league, and you know what I'm going to say, get ready because it’s about to get heavy.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: SCL Poland part 2 - Who will win the title in Poland and take 25 points for the world ranking. It is very exciting on the top, in part 1 between Poland and Latvia. Another great episode with super strongman events such as: Bag Toss Medley, Log Lift Reps and the Powerstairs. Also an interview with Mateusz Kieloszkowski, the all time favorite champion from Poland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: It’s time to show our strength and gain respect from the gods of Olympus. Our gladiators have many events set out by no other than Hercules himself. The coliseum is ready here on this mythological island of Cyprus, so we have landed in Limassol were again 12 Top Strongmen are battling for the title and ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E14 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 14 - South Africa
programme.desc: The only and official world championship Truckpulling for its 10th year, again at the Strongman Champions league. With the 3 times Worldchampion Kelvin de Ruiter – defending his title. This championship has trucks in all shapes and sizes which is a lot like our athletes, there all different pay loads, but does the biggest win or is it the strongest.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E15 Stage 15 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Years and years of determination has brought us here today, when all the walls felt like they were caving in perseverance. When their bodies were screaming, hurting, shouting stop, beneath. These are the things which make up a man, these are the things that bring you world finalists. This episode they fight for the greatest title of all, they fight to put their names in the history books forever.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E16 Stage 16 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Part 2 of the World Finals of the Strongman Champions League tour 2023 at the Sarajevo Centar Skenderija in Bosnia. 3 Events was done already and amazing results have been set. Who will be the new World champion? Find out here, who, after 16 stages, will be crowned World Champion 2023.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: Across seven rivers, through mountains and forests, 12 strongmen go to toughest places to find out who is strongest Viking in the World and open a new season of Strongman champions league for 2015. Events like the Hercules Hold, Yoke Race and pulling a real Viking ship are some of the ingredients of this fantastic show.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of Strongman champions league will be hosted in Germany, by FIBO - the leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health worldwide with 300,000 visitors in four days. Special implements like the biggest log in the world or the special Bavarian stone lift are not only a challenge, but also an opportunity for new personal, national and world records.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 3, Holland

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 4, Finland
programme.desc: Zydrunas Savickas, one of strongest people on earth is in this competition which has attracted the attention of the audience in the battle for the title of strongest man in Finland. The next round of SCL is in Bulgaria.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 5, Bulgaria

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 6, Latvia

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 7, Croatia
programme.desc: The competition sees a close battle with a new world record in overhead dumbbell and close finishes throughout the day. This stage is in Croatia, in a city over 1700 years old, steeped in Roman tradition and history, the athletes arrive for the truck pull after a picturesque boat ride on the Adriatic Sea.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 8, Poland

programme.desc: In this stage we go into the mountains of Austria to find out through six grueling events who is the strongest in the land of Alps. Martin Wildauer, current World Champion 2014 and Austrian local is competing alongside Zageris, Radzikowski, Belsak and many others.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 10, Romania

programme.desc: The 11th stage is the SCL Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. In this championship, each competitor must lift three different weights overhead. Zydrunas Savickas is the current world record holder in the Log Lift.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 12, Lithuania
programme.desc: This next episode of the Strongman Champions League is hosted in Lithuania and sees us getting one step closer to the final.

programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 14, Martinique

programme.desc: A special World championship under the newcomers and lightweights in the Strongman world. Some of them will step from this to the heavyweights divisions.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 16, World Finals Turkey
programme.desc: After 15 outstanding competitions all over the world, finally we are here at the final competition of this year’s Strongman Champions League hosted in Turkey.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stages 8 and 9 of the SCL are hosted in Vaasa, Finland, taking place over a spectacular two-day event. After 3 wins so far, Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia plans to extend his lead at the top of the table. Among the other 13 highly motivated strongmen, two SCL legends will make their comeback to the competition: Former World Champion of 2015, Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland) and Dainis Zageris (Latvia).

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S04 : E56 Jodha Akbar S4 E56
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 This is Fate S2 E16
programme.desc: The story revolves around the two sisters of Pragya, from Kumkum Bhagya. Her sisters are Preeta and Shristhi who discover the existence of their mother Sarla and sister Pragya, after their father’s death. The sisters try to unite with their mother and sister.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: Guddan
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E363 Undercover Love S1 E363
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Maitree
programme.sub-title: S01 : E118 Maitree: The Rules of Love S1 E118
programme.desc: The lives of three friends, Nandini, Maitree and Ashish get inexplicably intertwined when an accident brings unexpected changes in their lives.

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E364 King of Hearts S1 E364
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E364 Second Chances S1 E364
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 This is Fate S2 E16
programme.desc: The story revolves around the two sisters of Pragya, from Kumkum Bhagya. Her sisters are Preeta and Shristhi who discover the existence of their mother Sarla and sister Pragya, after their father’s death. The sisters try to unite with their mother and sister.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.desc: A brave officer Arjun is shattered when his beloved dies in a terrorist attack and he's left paralysed. However, Arjun is chosen as the test case for a new AI-led technology that can turn him into a super soldier. Just then, a terrorist crisis erupts. Arjun rises to the occasion, but can he avert the disaster?

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Saheb Biwi Aur Gangster 3
programme.desc: Madhvi Devi now turned to politics is enjoying her power and position in royal house after Aditya Pratap Singh lands in jail while his second wife Ranjana has turned alcoholic.Aditya Pratap is soon to be released from jail and Madhvi feels this could harm her position as both are still hungry for each others power and blood.Madhvi finds she is pregnant after she spends night with Aditya upon his return they both decide to raise the baby by forgetting their bygones.London based Uday Pratap Singh has his roots in India where he is having tiff with his father Maharaja Hari Singh and brother Vijay while his only support is his mother Yashododhra.Uday has Suhani as his keep in India while has...

programme.sub-title: S01 : E361 King of Hearts S1 E361
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E363 Undercover Love S1 E363
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: La Dolce Vita
programme.desc: With the Alfieri, Maserati in 2014 celebrated their anniversary with the introduction of a beautiful grand tourer. In remembrance and as part of the three-day celebration, Maserati organised a cruise from Bologna to Torino with some of their most iconic cars.

programme.title: Ron Williams and his Cadillac
programme.desc: The 1952 Cadillac Fleetwood is also known as the American Rolls-Royce, because it’s the car of celebrities, presidents, millionaires and mafia bosses. One owner of this rare classic car is German-American actor and entertainer Ron Williams.

programme.title: Porsche Carrera RS
programme.desc: In the early 1970s the Porsche Carrera RS was the fastest and most agile production sports car in Germany. Today the RS is a Porsche classic with highest acclaim.

programme.title: Driving pleasure in winter
programme.desc: Slippery or muddy roads and bad visibility are circumstances that often spoil driving pleasure in winter. We took two almost identical Porsche 911's to an icy test track. Also: drifting fun in the snow with the Suzuki SX4 S-Cross.

programme.title: Parking Wars
programme.desc: Not only in the big cities it's a growing struggle for parking spots. . We took the BMW X6, the Citroen Cactus and the Smart forfour to town in order to find out how these cars would cope in this situation and surrounding.

programme.title: Primm 300
programme.desc: 500 kilometres of sand and dust. The Primm 300 is the world's toughest desert rally. We accompanied the former European Rally champion Armin Schwarz to one of his toughest challenges, from the first preparations and trial runs to the finish line.

programme.title: The SUV Desert Challenge
programme.desc: Offroad legend Duncan Barbour took a group of men to Oman in order to test the off-road capabilities of the Mercedes-Benz SUV models. Also: how does the Mercedes Benz GL, a 7-seater full-size luxury SUV, perform in the urban jungle of Dubai?

programme.title: Volkswagen Beetle
programme.desc: A success story that was made in Germany: The Volkswagen Beetle. No other car has ever moved the masses so much, both in distances, as well as emotions.

programme.title: Pistenbully
programme.desc: The Pistenbully is a made in Germany powerpack traversing the ski slopes all over the world. For over 40 years it has been the undisputed number 1 among the snow groomers.

programme.title: Roding
programme.desc: What happens when four engineers fresh out of university are allowed to build a super sports car? One of the rarest and most unusual vehicles there is: the two-seater Roding Roadster.

programme.title: Walter Röhrl
programme.desc: One cannot talk about rally sports without mentioning the name Walter Röhrl. From an early age, Röhrl showed his talent in rally sports and won the European, World and other international rally championships several times in his career.

programme.title: Hans-Joachim Stuck
programme.desc: Hans-Joachim Stuck is one of the best racing drivers in Germany. Over his long career he not only won the Formula II and several international touring car championships multiple times but also the famous 24-hour race of Le Mans twice.

programme.title: All-Wheel Vehicles for the Streets
programme.desc: The Audi Q2 is a sportback coupe is the entry-level model for the German brand’s SUV range. Also: test-driving the SsangYong XLV lifestyle SUV. And: Mercedes present their "sportscar among SUVs", the GLC Coupe.

programme.title: Wildly through the desert
programme.desc: BMW and the German racing team X-Raid take part in the Dakar Rally with a transformed Mini Countryman. Also: the Mercedes G63 AMG 6x6, a 6-wheel off-road monster. And: the Kia Sportage feels both at home in the rocky terrain of Sicily and the city.

programme.title: Tuning World
programme.desc: For more than 20 years the Tuning World Bodensee has been one of the top events in the European car tuning scene. Also: with their i-models BMW started to explore alternative drive technologies. And: taking the Nissan Leaf to Oslo.

programme.title: All New!
programme.desc: Following the Porsche 911's anniversary we take a look back at this iconic model's history. Also: the world's first series-produced plug-in hybrid with a diesel engine, the Volvo V60. And: safety measures in the car world, from seatbelts to crash tests.

programme.title: Enduro Park Hechlingen
programme.desc: The BMW Enduro Park Hechlingen in Bavaria offers off-road driving pleasure both for beginners and pros alike on 26 hectares. We take a look at what this exciting place has to offer for enduro enthusiasts. Also: what does the inexpensive Hyosung ST 700 i from South Korea have to offer? And: the big-wheeled scooter from Taiwan, the Kymco People GT 300i.

programme.title: Triumph Thunderbird
programme.desc: The parallel twin-cylinder Triumph Thunderbird. Is the powerful 1.6 litre bike able to gain a foothold outside of the British Isles? Also: Harley-Davidson's black chopper Sportster 883 Iron, a starter bike for purists. And: Bike & Music, a spectacle for motorbike and stunt enthusiasts at Europe's biggest motorway rest area in Geiselwind, Germany.

programme.title: Iconic Racing Classics
programme.desc: Cars like the Ford GT 40, the Jaguar D-Type or the Mercedes 300 SL wrote history on the race track and now break records at auctions. A sumptuously restored 300 SL will start at the most famous classic car rally in the world, the Mille Miglia.

programme.title: Saalbach Classic 2014
programme.desc: At the 2014 Saalbach Classic rally 80 teams raced their automobile rarities through the Austrian Alps. In addition: rally legend Walter Röhrl in a Porsche 911 RSR at the Cologne-Ahrweiler rally. And: the infamous Group B vehicle category.

programme.title: Turbo Diesel Power
programme.desc: We took a look at Audi's latest generation of TDI engines and their RS5 TDI Concept. In addition we compared the advantages and disadvantages of the two main fossil fuels for cars, gasoline and diesel. And: the 2014 Porsche Cayenne Diesel.

programme.title: Lightweight Cars
programme.desc: The BMW i8 was one of the first sports cars with some sort of a green image. In addition we took two fly-weight sports cars, the Lotus Elise and the Roding Roadster, to one of the most beautiful alpine pass roads.

programme.title: Supercars on the Rocks
programme.desc: Nissan's all-wheel monster GT-R had to prove its winter suitability and the new Porsche 911 with turbo engine was taken to its limits in Finnish Lapland. Also: the Mercedes-Benz S 500 plug-in hybrid.

programme.title: Lightness to the Extreme
programme.desc: The German manufacturer Roding created a car that even outshined the Porsche GT3 with an impressive power/weight ratio. British makes like the Caterham 620 R, Lotus Elise or Radical RXC also showed what's in play in regards to lightweight sports cars.

programme.title: The Fastest Cars in the World
programme.desc: Speed has always been one of the most important criteria when it comes to owning or driving a car. We show you our top 10 list of the fastest cars in the world.

programme.title: The Most Expensive Production Cars
programme.desc: Everyone knows that vehicles made by hand or in small numbers can be extremely expensive. But that can also be true for production vehicles. Here are our top 10 most expensive production cars.

programme.title: Fire!
programme.desc: It's getting hot in this episode of Stunt Heroes. Stuntman Paul will be engulfed by flames as everything around him blows up in this dangerous fire stunt. The Action Concept team carefully prepares for this heated scene.

programme.title: Revenge
programme.desc: The Stunt Heroes rehearse a car crash scene for a movie, in which it should seem as if the main character of the movie really drives the car. The team achieves this directive by using digital effects and constructing a special airbag.

programme.title: The White Army
programme.desc: The Stunt Heroes leave their headquarters and travel to a ski resort. They simulate the attack of an army of soldiers all dressed in white. As part of this scene they want to make a car explode and fly through the air.

programme.title: Porsche GT3 Streetracer
programme.desc: How do you top the already in many ways superior iconic Porsche 911? You come up with the GT3. It's the ultimate melange of road suitability and race track compatibility. And Porsche's RS model is even more intense.

programme.title: Limited Edition
programme.desc: The Tushek TS600, a limited edition super sports car had a power/weight ratio that is on the level of GT3 racing cars. The Bentley Continental GT3-R special edition was also limited whereas McLaren offered their 570S to all customers.

programme.title: The Most Successful Cars in the 24h Race
programme.desc: 24-hour races are one of the toughest tests for man and machine in motor racing. We present the most successful cars in this racing category in our Top 10 list.

programme.title: The Most Unusual Cars of Modern Times
programme.desc: You often get the impression that most cars are the same. But if you are looking for something special, you will find it. We present our top 10 selection of the most unusual modern cars.

programme.title: Mighty Convertibles
programme.desc: The Audi R8 Spyder is the most extreme convertible by the German brand. Also: the Ferrari California T scores with Italian passion and elegant lines. And: AMG's GT C Roadster with its roaring sound is a real bad boy with a touch of luxury.

programme.title: International Motor Show Frankfurt 2013
programme.desc: The stars of the 2013 IAA in Frankfurt were the Aston Martin Vanquish Volante, Porsche's 918 and 911 turbo models and the Jaguar F-Type coupe. Maserati introduced the Ghibli as a competition to Mercedes' E-Class and BMW's 5 series.

programme.title: Classic Cars with All-Wheel Drive
programme.desc: The Volkswagen Type 166 amphibious vehicle is the all-rounder amongst off-road vehicles. Also: the Peugeot 205 Turbo 16 all-wheeler turned the World Rally Championship in the 1980s on its head. And : the Willys Jeep in our drive report.

programme.title: Mobility in Eastern Europe
programme.desc: In the 1950s, companies like Tatra from Czechoslovakia introduced advanced, even pioneering automobiles. The clientele was exclusive, which is why now these streamlined cars are big rarities. We tracked down the owner of a 1937 Tatra T87.

programme.title: The big journey
programme.desc: The Mercedes-AMG E63 S is a wolf in sheep's clothing. This station wagon has more power than the Nissan GTR 'Godzilla'. Also: the Porsche Panamera GTS feels at home on the motorway and on the race track. And: Audi's powerful all-purpose executive car RS6.

programme.title: Pulse Rising Cars
programme.desc: With the Pulsar, Nissan returned to the European compact class market with a serious contender to the Volkswagen Golf. In addition: the American V8 dream sports car, the Chevrolet Corvette C7. And: Subaru's fifth-generation rally icon, the WRX STI.

programme.title: Mercedes ML 63 AMG
programme.desc: We put the Porsche Cayenne Turbo S and the Mercedes ML 63 AMG to the test. Also: the final round of the truck trial race at the Camp4fun at the Nürburgring in Germany. And: General Motors' new luxury SUV, the Cadillac SRX.

programme.title: Outback Off-Road Adventure
programme.desc: Australia's North-East is famous for its nature and wildlife. We accompanied the Germans Katrin and Uli on their 4x4 tour on the Great Tropical Drive in Queensland. Also: Clash of the Titans. We compared the Toyota Landcruiser and Mitsubishi Pajero.

programme.title: Harley Sportster 1972
programme.desc: Harley-Davidson add three additions to their model range of bikes: the motorized wheelie bike Sportster 72, the versatile Switchback Dyna, and the bad-boy ride „Softail Slim“. Also: two German bikers take a dusty adventure ride through Mexico on their BMW's. And: the Triumph Speedmaster, the British answer to Harley-Davidson's cruiser.

programme.title: Triumph Thunderbird
programme.desc: The parallel twin-cylinder Triumph Thunderbird. Is the powerful 1.6 litre bike able to gain a foothold outside of the British Isles? Also: Harley-Davidson's black chopper Sportster 883 Iron, a starter bike for purists. And: Bike & Music, a spectacle for motorbike and stunt enthusiasts at Europe's biggest motorway rest area in Geiselwind, Germany.

programme.title: Strong, Light and Fast
programme.desc: The Porsche Cayman GT4 combined the best elements that Porsche could offer. In addition: the Audi R8 V10 plus, an even stronger, lighter and faster version of the original model.

programme.title: Hypercars
programme.desc: The Mc Laren MP4 12C, the Porsche 911 Turbo S and the Mercedes SLS AMG GT are super sports cars that are second to none. We put the pedal to the metal in these exciting and powerful driving machines.

programme.title: Episode 10
programme.desc: Christian Menzel asked our presenter Miriam to participate in a driver safety training where he showed tips and tricks on what to do in emergency situations.

programme.title: Episode 11
programme.desc: Spring finally melted away the snow on the track and racing life returned to the Nuerburgring. Drivers with gasoline in their veins started chasing their cars around the ring again.

programme.title: Episode 15
programme.desc: We present the highlights of last week. The 24 hour race was exciting, as usual. In addition, we explored the 'Strong Man Run' and took a look at the tourist drivers

programme.title: McLaren MP4 12C GT3
programme.desc: McLaren's MP4 12C GT3 is as fast as a Formula One car. We explored how this super sports car came to be. Also: the German company Mechatronik specializes in restoring rare and classic cars like the Mercedes W111.

programme.title: Supercars of the Frankfurt Motor Show
programme.desc: We took a look at the IAA Frankfurt 2011 highlights, like the new Porsche 911, Mercedes' SLS AMG Roadster, the Bentley Continental Convertible, a 1,100 hp monster from Croatia and others.

programme.title: Wildly through the desert
programme.desc: BMW and the German racing team X-Raid take part in the Dakar Rally with a transformed Mini Countryman. Also: the Mercedes G63 AMG 6x6, a 6-wheel off-road monster. And: the Kia Sportage feels both at home in the rocky terrain of Sicily and the city.

programme.title: Real Winners
programme.desc: When BMW released the X6 in 2008, many people doubted that this concept would be successful. We took a look at the second generation of this model in the M50d version. Also: test driving the best-selling Opel Mokka. And: the Mercedes GLE Coupe.

programme.title: Audi Sport Quattro S1, Part 1
programme.desc: The Audi Sport quattro S1 is the most powerful and exciting rally car ever built. Based on the regular quattro, the S1 with its giant wings spread anxiety, fear and excitement among rally drivers and fans. Part 1 of 2

programme.title: Volvo 240
programme.desc: The Volvo 240T is a typical family car, it's rather heavy, sedate and not sporty at all. But hardly anyone knows that this Swedish car was once the real deal on the rally race track.

programme.title: Rear-wheel drive for everyone
programme.desc: Cars with a rear-wheel drive are usually considered to be agile but also a bit capricious in regards to their handling. Does this also apply to the Porsche GT3 and the Smart? In addition: the sporty midsize sedan model range, BMW's 3 Series.

programme.title: Fresh Air Experience
programme.desc: Smart offers its iconic city car with a convertible option. The Mini cabriolet is bigger and provides room for four people. When it comes to roadster feeling, the Mazda MX-5 is on top of the list. We took a closer look at these three open-top contenders.

programme.title: Le Mans 1952
programme.desc: The year 1952 saw several premieres at the legendary 24-hour endurance race of Le Mans. After 22 years Mercedes-Benz returned to the famous circuit, and Ferrari started to use factory works team cars for the first time.

programme.title: Rally Year 1972 - A Ford success story
programme.desc: The International Championship for Manufacturers was a rally series which was run from 1970 to 1972. Car manufacturers such as Porsche, Renault, Opel and Ford took part in this competition, with Ford having an exceptionally successful year in 1972.

programme.title: German Touring Car Championship 1992
programme.desc: The Deutsche Tourenwagen Meisterschaft was one of the most important racing series in German motorsports. It was difficult, tough and well-known for its die-hard battles between the international competitors. We present the highlights of the 1992 race.

programme.title: The Most Exciting Classic Car Races
programme.desc: Exciting GT sports cars from the 1960s, the pre-war Silver Arrows, hot classic cars on ice and historic Formula 1 cars. We present the most exciting classic car races in Germany.

programme.title: Saalbach Classic 2014
programme.desc: At the 2014 Saalbach Classic rally 80 teams raced their automobile rarities through the Austrian Alps. In addition: rally legend Walter Röhrl in a Porsche 911 RSR at the Cologne-Ahrweiler rally. And: the infamous Group B vehicle category.

programme.title: Porsche Carrera Cup 1990
programme.desc: 1990 was an extremely thrilling year at the Porsche Carrera Cup, the fastest and most exciting one-make racing event. Porsche started with the new Carrera 2 Cup Coupe with 265hp generated by a powerful 6-cylinder engine.

programme.title: The Golden Age of Rally Sports
programme.desc: The late 1950s saw the dawn of the Golden Age of rally motorsports. Rally racing became a professional sport and the automotive industry began to build tougher cars, whereas drivers started to specialize in competitive motorsports.

programme.title: Alois Ruf
programme.desc: Alois Ruf is the founder of a small, but well-known car manufacturing company in Bavaria that specialises in building their own vision of street legal super sports cars on the foundation of Porsche bodys.

programme.title: Prince Leopold von Bayern
programme.desc: Coming from a famous noble family, Prince Leopold of Bavaria started a career as a rally driver in the 1960s before switching to touring cars. He successfully took part in several international races for the Porsche and BMW brands.

programme.title: Rally Year 1972 - A Ford success story
programme.desc: The International Championship for Manufacturers was a rally series which was run from 1970 to 1972. Car manufacturers such as Porsche, Renault, Opel and Ford took part in this competition, with Ford having an exceptionally successful year in 1972.

programme.title: German Touring Car Championship 1992
programme.desc: The Deutsche Tourenwagen Meisterschaft was one of the most important racing series in German motorsports. It was difficult, tough and well-known for its die-hard battles between the international competitors. We present the highlights of the 1992 race.

programme.title: Ron Williams and his Cadillac
programme.desc: The 1952 Cadillac Fleetwood is also known as the American Rolls-Royce, because it’s the car of celebrities, presidents, millionaires and mafia bosses. One owner of this rare classic car is German-American actor and entertainer Ron Williams.

And: Bike & Music, a spectacle for motorbike and stunt enthusiasts at Europe's biggest motorway rest area in Geiselwind, Germany.

programme.title: Stereotypes on Two Wheels
programme.desc: Scooters, stereotypes on two wheels? It doesn't always have to be a classic Vespa! We take a look at three alternatives: Kymco's big scooter xciting 500 i that feels like riding on a sofa, Piaggio's three-wheeler MP3 500 with two front wheels that promises more dynamic driving pleasure and the powerful electric scooter e-max from China.

programme.title: Iconic Racing Classics
programme.desc: Cars like the Ford GT 40, the Jaguar D-Type or the Mercedes 300 SL wrote history on the race track and now break records at auctions. A sumptuously restored 300 SL will start at the most famous classic car rally in the world, the Mille Miglia.

programme.title: Saalbach Classic 2014
programme.desc: At the 2014 Saalbach Classic rally 80 teams raced their automobile rarities through the Austrian Alps. In addition: rally legend Walter Röhrl in a Porsche 911 RSR at the Cologne-Ahrweiler rally. And: the infamous Group B vehicle category.

programme.title: Turbo Diesel Power
programme.desc: We took a look at Audi's latest generation of TDI engines and their RS5 TDI Concept. In addition we compared the advantages and disadvantages of the two main fossil fuels for cars, gasoline and diesel. And: the 2014 Porsche Cayenne Diesel.

programme.title: Lightweight Cars
programme.desc: The BMW i8 was one of the first sports cars with some sort of a green image. In addition we took two fly-weight sports cars, the Lotus Elise and the Roding Roadster, to one of the most beautiful alpine pass roads.

programme.title: Supercars on the Rocks
programme.desc: Nissan's all-wheel monster GT-R had to prove its winter suitability and the new Porsche 911 with turbo engine was taken to its limits in Finnish Lapland. Also: the Mercedes-Benz S 500 plug-in hybrid.

programme.title: Lightness to the Extreme
programme.desc: The German manufacturer Roding created a car that even outshined the Porsche GT3 with an impressive power/weight ratio. British makes like the Caterham 620 R, Lotus Elise or Radical RXC also showed what's in play in regards to lightweight sports cars.

programme.title: The Fastest Cars in the World
programme.desc: Speed has always been one of the most important criteria when it comes to owning or driving a car. We show you our top 10 list of the fastest cars in the world.

programme.title: The Most Expensive Production Cars
programme.desc: Everyone knows that vehicles made by hand or in small numbers can be extremely expensive. But that can also be true for production vehicles. Here are our top 10 most expensive production cars.

programme.title: Revenge
programme.desc: The Stunt Heroes rehearse a car crash scene for a movie, in which it should seem as if the main character of the movie really drives the car. The team achieves this directive by using digital effects and constructing a special airbag.

programme.title: The White Army
programme.desc: The Stunt Heroes leave their headquarters and travel to a ski resort. They simulate the attack of an army of soldiers all dressed in white. As part of this scene they want to make a car explode and fly through the air.

programme.title: Porsche GT3 Streetracer
programme.desc: How do you top the already in many ways superior iconic Porsche 911? You come up with the GT3. It's the ultimate melange of road suitability and race track compatibility. And Porsche's RS model is even more intense.

programme.title: Limited Edition
programme.desc: The Tushek TS600, a limited edition super sports car had a power/weight ratio that is on the level of GT3 racing cars. The Bentley Continental GT3-R special edition was also limited whereas McLaren offered their 570S to all customers.

programme.title: The Most Successful Cars in the 24h Race
programme.desc: 24-hour races are one of the toughest tests for man and machine in motor racing. We present the most successful cars in this racing category in our Top 10 list.

programme.title: The Most Unusual Cars of Modern Times
programme.desc: You often get the impression that most cars are the same. But if you are looking for something special, you will find it. We present our top 10 selection of the most unusual modern cars.

programme.title: Mighty Convertibles
programme.desc: The Audi R8 Spyder is the most extreme convertible by the German brand. Also: the Ferrari California T scores with Italian passion and elegant lines. And: AMG's GT C Roadster with its roaring sound is a real bad boy with a touch of luxury.

programme.title: International Motor Show Frankfurt 2013
programme.desc: The stars of the 2013 IAA in Frankfurt were the Aston Martin Vanquish Volante, Porsche's 918 and 911 turbo models and the Jaguar F-Type coupe. Maserati introduced the Ghibli as a competition to Mercedes' E-Class and BMW's 5 series.

programme.title: Fiat Dino
programme.desc: The Fiat Dino Spider is one of the most beautiful cabriolets of the 1960s. Its impeccable design was created by Pininfarina, and only 525 units were built. Under its hood growls a Ferrari V6 engine.

programme.title: The Most Exciting Classic Car Races
programme.desc: Exciting GT sports cars from the 1960s, the pre-war Silver Arrows, hot classic cars on ice and historic Formula 1 cars. We present the most exciting classic car races in Germany.

programme.title: Ready for Action
programme.desc: Behind the scenes of some of the exciting stunts at Action Concept, the biggest action movie production company in Europe. Also: Johannes and Ferdinand Stuck with the BMW Alpina D5 Twin Turbo at the test track. And: the Volkswagen Up city car.

programme.title: Porsche Carrera World Cup
programme.desc: In June 2011 motor sports enthusiasts from all around the world eagerly awaited the start of the Porsche Carrera World Cup at the infamous Nürburgring Nordschleife. We show you some of the most exciting moments of this event.

programme.title: Audi R8 GT vs. Jaguar XKR
programme.desc: The ultimate competition: Aston Martin Virage vs. Jaguar XKR vs. Audi's R8 GT vs. Mercedes SLS. Also: Artega claims that their GT is a 'Porsche killer'. Is that so? And: Formula One champion Sebastian Vettel takes the Infinity FX50 to the test.

programme.title: Episode 12
programme.desc: Once again it was time for the VLN Endurance Racing Championship. While the drivers were doing their test laps, we had a look behind the scenes and explored what went on in the pit lanes.

programme.title: Episode 13
programme.desc: The Nuerburgring shook when the VLN began its second leg of the tournament. We once again accompany you to this exciting competition, including the highlights of BMW's 1st leg win.

programme.title: Nova SS vs Honda Accord
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: On Put Your Car On TV, car fans from the Middle East can have their darlings rated in terms of speed, style and sound. Included this time: a Nova SS, a special Honda Accord and a car clad in crystals.

programme.title: Ford Mustang vs Chevy Corvette
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: Car lovers from the Middle East present their vehicles at the Sofitel Dubai Jumeirah Beach. There is a weekend at the hotel to be won. A Ford Mustang and a limited edition Chevrolet Corvette are up for judging this time.

programme.title: Open-Top Sportscars
programme.desc: The Audi R8 V10 Spyder's design and sophisticated technology was meant to set an example for what a car manufacturer is capable of. In addition: the Wiesmann Roadster MF5. And: Porsche's house tuner Ruf turned up the volume with their RT 35 model.

programme.title: Porsche Carrera World Cup
programme.desc: In June 2011 motor sports enthusiasts from all around the world eagerly awaited the start of the Porsche Carrera World Cup at the infamous Nürburgring Nordschleife. We show you some of the most exciting moments of this event.

programme.title: Audi R8 GT vs. Jaguar XKR
programme.desc: The ultimate competition: Aston Martin Virage vs. Jaguar XKR vs. Audi's R8 GT vs. Mercedes SLS. Also: Artega claims that their GT is a 'Porsche killer'. Is that so? And: Formula One champion Sebastian Vettel takes the Infinity FX50 to the test.

programme.title: Ford Mustang vs Chevy Corvette
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: Car lovers from the Middle East present their vehicles at the Sofitel Dubai Jumeirah Beach. There is a weekend at the hotel to be won. A Ford Mustang and a limited edition Chevrolet Corvette are up for judging this time.

programme.title: BMW X6M vs Nissan Patrol
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: At Jumeirah Beach in Dubai, car owners can have their souped-up vehicles judged in three categories and win an overnight stay at the Sofitel Hotel. This time, a BMW X6M, a Ford F250 and a Nissan Patrol are in the running.

programme.title: Episode 20
programme.desc: At the old-timer grand prix at the Nuerburgring you for example can see the Mercedes S with 160 horsepower that lead Rudolf Caracciola to victory in the 1927 opening race.

programme.title: Episode 10
programme.desc: Christian Menzel asked our presenter Miriam to participate in a driver safety training where he showed tips and tricks on what to do in emergency situations.

programme.title: Audi Sport Quattro S1, Part 1
programme.desc: The Audi Sport quattro S1 is the most powerful and exciting rally car ever built. Based on the regular quattro, the S1 with its giant wings spread anxiety, fear and excitement among rally drivers and fans. Part 1 of 2

programme.title: Volvo 240
programme.desc: The Volvo 240T is a typical family car, it's rather heavy, sedate and not sporty at all. But hardly anyone knows that this Swedish car was once the real deal on the rally race track.

programme.title: Rear-wheel drive for everyone
programme.desc: Cars with a rear-wheel drive are usually considered to be agile but also a bit capricious in regards to their handling. Does this also apply to the Porsche GT3 and the Smart? In addition: the sporty midsize sedan model range, BMW's 3 Series.

programme.title: Fresh Air Experience
programme.desc: Smart offers its iconic city car with a convertible option. The Mini cabriolet is bigger and provides room for four people. When it comes to roadster feeling, the Mazda MX-5 is on top of the list. We took a closer look at these three open-top contenders.

programme.title: Rally Year 1972 - A Ford success story
programme.desc: The International Championship for Manufacturers was a rally series which was run from 1970 to 1972. Car manufacturers such as Porsche, Renault, Opel and Ford took part in this competition, with Ford having an exceptionally successful year in 1972.

programme.title: German Touring Car Championship 1992
programme.desc: The Deutsche Tourenwagen Meisterschaft was one of the most important racing series in German motorsports. It was difficult, tough and well-known for its die-hard battles between the international competitors. We present the highlights of the 1992 race.

programme.title: The Most Exciting Classic Car Races
programme.desc: Exciting GT sports cars from the 1960s, the pre-war Silver Arrows, hot classic cars on ice and historic Formula 1 cars. We present the most exciting classic car races in Germany.

programme.title: Saalbach Classic 2014
programme.desc: At the 2014 Saalbach Classic rally 80 teams raced their automobile rarities through the Austrian Alps. In addition: rally legend Walter Röhrl in a Porsche 911 RSR at the Cologne-Ahrweiler rally. And: the infamous Group B vehicle category.

programme.title: BMW Motorsport, Season 1976
programme.desc: In the 1970s the 3 Litre BMW CSL was one of the dream cars in the Bavarian manufacturer's motorsports history. In the 1976 season not only this model celebrated successes in several international racing competitions.

programme.title: Porsche Carrera Cup 1990
programme.desc: 1990 was an extremely thrilling year at the Porsche Carrera Cup, the fastest and most exciting one-make racing event. Porsche started with the new Carrera 2 Cup Coupe with 265hp generated by a powerful 6-cylinder engine.

programme.title: The Golden Age of Rally Sports
programme.desc: The late 1950s saw the dawn of the Golden Age of rally motorsports. Rally racing became a professional sport and the automotive industry began to build tougher cars, whereas drivers started to specialize in competitive motorsports.

programme.title: 40 Years of BMW M
programme.desc: Several years ago, BMW celebrated the 40th anniversary of their successful M GmbH subsidiary. It all began in 1972 with the introduction of the BMW M1. Still today, the M models are the go-to for car enthusiasts.

programme.title: Best of 2012
programme.desc: Racing driver Patrick Simon presents a few of his personal highlights, like the Ferrari FF, McLaren's British super car MP4 12C, the Lamborghinis Gallardo Performante and Superleggera and the versatile Lexus IS-F.

programme.title: Salto Mortale
programme.desc: The Stunt Heroes face a new mission: performing a front-flip through the air with a stuntman behind the wheel of an estate wagon. Stuntmen Daniel and Lars display a brilliant fight choreography in some spectacular driving scenes.

programme.title: The Remote Control
programme.desc: Stuntman Tobi operates an Artega GT at full speed via remote control. This is just a warm-up before the big stunt, in which he drives a car up a steep ramp at 68 mph. The question is: How high can remote-controlled cars fly?

programme.title: Episode 10
programme.desc: Christian Menzel asked our presenter Miriam to participate in a driver safety training where he showed tips and tricks on what to do in emergency situations.

programme.title: Episode 11
programme.desc: Spring finally melted away the snow on the track and racing life returned to the Nuerburgring. Drivers with gasoline in their veins started chasing their cars around the ring again.

programme.title: Drift!
programme.desc: The Subaru BRZ provides a great feel for the road. In addition: the BMW 235i RS has a great rear wheel performance. And: the Porsche Cayman GTS is a car that makes you smile from the moment you step on the gas.

programme.title: Ferrari FF
programme.desc: The Ferrari Four, also called Ferrari FF, is the first four-wheel family car from Maranello. Also: the BMW M5 shines both as a family and business car. And: the Mercedes-Benz SL is a roadster drivers' dream.

programme.title: BMW F 800 R
programme.desc: Stunt world champion Chris Pfeiffer test drives the BMW F 800 R and explains why he is rather excited about the performance and handling of this robust and agile roadster. Also: a look behind the scenes of German helmet manufacturer Schuberth Helme's testing and development procedures. And: German actor Jürgen Vogel puts his new Ducati 1198 SP to the test at the Nürburgring.

programme.title: Harley Sportster 1972
programme.desc: Harley-Davidson add three additions to their model range of bikes: the motorized wheelie bike Sportster 72, the versatile Switchback Dyna, and the bad-boy ride „Softail Slim“. Also: two German bikers take a dusty adventure ride through Mexico on their BMW's. And: the Triumph Speedmaster, the British answer to Harley-Davidson's cruiser.

programme.title: Episode 21
programme.desc: In this episode, we focused on Phoenix Racing, the successful team from the Eifel Region that rocked the DTM.

programme.title: Episode 12
programme.desc: Once again it was time for the VLN Endurance Racing Championship. While the drivers were doing their test laps, we had a look behind the scenes and explored what went on in the pit lanes.

programme.title: The Most Exciting Classic Car Races
programme.desc: Exciting GT sports cars from the 1960s, the pre-war Silver Arrows, hot classic cars on ice and historic Formula 1 cars. We present the most exciting classic car races in Germany.

programme.title: Volvo 240
programme.desc: The Volvo 240T is a typical family car, it's rather heavy, sedate and not sporty at all. But hardly anyone knows that this Swedish car was once the real deal on the rally race track.

programme.title: Fresh Air Experience
programme.desc: Smart offers its iconic city car with a convertible option. The Mini cabriolet is bigger and provides room for four people. When it comes to roadster feeling, the Mazda MX-5 is on top of the list. We took a closer look at these three open-top contenders.

programme.title: While You Were Sleeping

programme.desc: Jae Chan and Seung Won are planning to eat breakfast every morning at Hong Joo's house.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near the Mexican border, the group is rescued from a zombie hoard by Escorpion, who leads them to La Reina, the "Queen of the Dead." As a bounty for Murphy, La Reina offers them a reward or a free pass to join her group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team finally arrives in California. As they near their goal, each member thinks back to where they were at the beginning of the apocalypse and what it took to get where they are today.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Los Angeles, the team drives through the abandoned city to the coordinates of the mobile CDC lab provided by Citizen Z. There, they discover the lab isn't just a lab - it's a submarine.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 1.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 2.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While on the road to establish his headquarters in Spokane, Murphy saves the life of a dying girl. When her parents show up and ask to be bitten too, his mission gains momentum. Meanwhile, Warren leads the new mission group to a strange town.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: As more people flock to Murphy's new cult, Dr. Merch works on a blend vaccine as well as a booster shot to slow to Murphy's descent into zombiedom.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Alone and suffering from the effects of Merch's booster, 10K barely escapes Murphy and is stalked by a blend.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc finds himself taken captive by a psychotic nurse and her surviving mental patients, and he later discovers that 10K is being held too.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Looking for Lucy, Doc and Addy run into Skeezy and Sketch, who is running for "President of the Apocalypse."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the others inspect Murphytown and realize they are going to need a bigger army to extract Murphy. Warren finds an old ally in El Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Upon finding Lucy, Doc and Addy work hard to stay alive and earn the family's trust. After a dangerous game of zombie hide-and-seek, an apocalyptic fairytale and a close call with an ender, Addy and Doc convince the family to follow them to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc tries to find a way to tell Warren about Lucy's kidnapping. In the meantime, he encounters a radio tower and castle-like compound inhabited by three attractive, crafty ladies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren leads an attack against Murphytown to extract its smug leader.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy and Doc catch up with Warren, but the reunion is short-lived as the group faces the biggest battle yet.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Two years later, things have gotten worse: Warren's apocalyptic dreams continue while the group fights MAD-Zs.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Driven by her dream of a black rainbow and flesh-eating rain, Warren and Murphy escape Zona, while Doc, 10K and Sarge are pinned down by snipers.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When Sun Mei and Red vanish, the group must decide whether to keep looking for them or press on to Newmerica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team is captured and enslaved in an elaborate underground facility, forced by their mysterious captors to perform a series of bizarre and dangerous tasks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lucy fights to save Murphy's life, while Warren and the others battle a biologically modified zombie.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Shaken by the death a groupmate, something snaps in Murphy. Warren is unable to stop him and the others from committing an atrocity as misplaced revenge.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group encounter a mysterious stranger who they think is a grave robber - but turns out to be something much more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Chicago, Doc and Murphy encounter a mysterious - and murderous - group, including Sketchy and Skeezy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group returns to Mercy Labs, where they first met The Man, to retrieve another item from Warren's dreams.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: At Mount Weather, the group learns the thumb print of the president is necessary to achieve Warren's goal.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the mind-bending season finale, the team arrives in Washington, D.C. and the secret of Warren's dreams is revealed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following the drone crash, Warren is nursed back to health by attractive homesteader Cooper. Meanwhile, the others finally reach Newmerica, and Murphy goes his own way.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Panic and anti-talker sentiments flare after an explosion derails the vote - and rumors blame a talker. 10K, Sarge and Red are attacked by old-school zombies and suffer devastating losses, and Murphy finds his loyal blends are still out there.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: 10K and Red attend a ceremony for those lost in Altura. Warren, Doc, Citizen Z and George arrive in Pacifica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A new spate of terrorist bombings hit Pacifica. In order to follow his vision for human-talker unity, George seeks those responsible for the attacks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group wind up at a wild casino and shelter for fugitive talkers run by Murphy and his blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group arrives at the farming outpost that produces flour for Z-bizkuits, but it is overrun by zombies, Pandora and starving talkers laying in wait to kill them.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group is reunited with old Native friends who are defending a dam that controls Newmerica's water from talkers. In order to help, Doc and Warren undertake spiritual journeys.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group discovers Altura militia forces have enslaved talkers to mine hazardous waste for Z-bizkuits.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: With help from renegade hackers, Warren and George hack Altura's defenses and discover Estes' secret plan.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren works with humans, talkers and blends to help George defeat Estes and Pandora. Newmericans can finally vote, but before Warren can relax, Cooper reappears with a shocking revelation.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A team starts its journey transporting the only survivor of the zombie virus from New York to Los Angeles, CA.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of gas, the team follows a suspicious stranger to a damaged oil refinery deep inside a New Jersey no-go zone packed with zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Out to get Cassandra back, her bizarre and dangerous "family" of cannibals catches up with the team and kidnaps Addy, endangering the mission.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A tornado forces the team to Warren's hometown, where she searches for her husband who she lost track of in the early days of the apocalypse.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After taking refuge in a safe enclave where no weapons are allowed, the team finds itself thrust into a battle for control of the compound against a zombie-worshipping cult.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lost and out of water in rural Kansas, the team is on the verge of breaking up before arriving at a Wild West-style bar. Guns, liquor and a zombie-shooting contest: what could go wrong?

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When the last surviving cosmonaut from the International Space Station crashes on Earth, Citizen Z gets a real, live buddy - but it quickly becomes clear that his new friend has a secret agenda.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While in South Dakota, an imminent meltdown forces the team to help the locals repair a nearby nuclear power plant full of radiated zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of shelter and supplies, the team seeks refuge in an all-female compound where men are not allowed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Some strangers earn their ways into the team, taking a keen interest in Murphy, but things take a deadly turn.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A change in plans has the team re-routed to a Colorado viral lab located in a nuclear missile silo. The team searches for Dr. Merch, the developer of the experimental vaccine previously given to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Each member of the group goes through a near-death experience while being attacked by bounty hunters. Mack is bitten after being caught in a zombie-infested stairwell.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After finally tracking down Murphy, the group comes across a caravan of survivors transporting victims of the nuclear blast to safety. Along the way, the mission is attacked by "blasters," zombies mutated by the radioactive fallout.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: On the quest for a cure for the virus, the group makes its way to the greenhouse where Batch 47 is being grown by Odegard. There, Odegard warns them about zombie-plant hybrids.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy's past comes back to haunt him when Serena tracks him down. The team stumbles upon a hidden farm.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy separates from the group out of fear that they may take the baby away - and kill her. Vasquez and Warren are injured and wind up in an abandoned hospital. 10K is forced to make a tragic decision during a conflict with Cassandra.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Tricked into a trap by use of a fresh brain lure, Murphy is captured by a zombie fan known as "The Collector."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near Roswell, New Mexico, the group encounters a community, led by a woman called Bernadette, which they believe is above a secret underground base that may contain useful equipment.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy, Warren, Vasquez and Addy find themselves at a casino while 10K and Doc are captured by Natives.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group becomes embroiled in corporate politics while seeking shelter at a hotel overtaken by white-collar survivors. There, Murphy is hunted.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: All hell breaks loose when it's discovered that not only does Dr. Kurian's vaccine not work but everyone who was injected will come under Murphy's control after an incubation period.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team finally arrives in California. As they near their goal, each member thinks back to where they were at the beginning of the apocalypse and what it took to get where they are today.
